title: 102: Bachelor Catch Up & Baby Chat
itunes:title: 102: Bachelor Catch Up & Baby Chat
description:
The Broads discuss some topics from Bekah’s baby announcement last week, then finally chat about Pilot Pete’s promo previews, some more Bachelor tea, and then answer some #broadsquad Bachelor and baby based questions! 
THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS:

*** FRAMEBRIDGE: Go to Framebridge.com (http://framebridge.com/) and use promo code CHATTY to save 15% off your first order!
